tags.name: Point feature
tags.description: Operations related to geographical point features

tags.name: Line feature
tags.description: Operations related to geographical line features

tags.name: Polygon feature
tags.description: Operations related to geographical polygon features

get.description: Returns a simple hello message from the FakeGeo API.

200.description: A successful response containing the line feature

post.summary: Returns a line geojson feature within a GeoJSON polygon or bbox
post.description: Accepts a GeoJSON Polygon or a bounding box (bbox) and returns a line within it.

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to return a line within it

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to return a line within it

get.summary: Returns a random line geojson Feature

200.description: A successful response containing the random line feature

post.summary: Returns a random line geojson feature within a GeoJSON polygon or bbox
post.description: Accepts a GeoJSON Polygon or a bounding box (bbox) and returns a random line within it.

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to return a random line within it

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to return a random line within it
